advanced.title: Advanced Visualization & Step-by-Step Analysis
advanced.step1: Annual production ‚Üí hourly production calculated: {{prodKmolH}} kmol/h.
advanced.step4: Catalyst requirement calculated by trapezoidal integration: W = {{W}} kg.

note.title: Calculation Steps (Summary):
note.content1: 1. Annual production is converted to kg‚Üíkmol/year and kmol/h.
note.content2: 2. Limiting reactant feed flow; if limiting is A: F‚ÇÄ‚ÇçA‚Çé = (Production [kmol/h] √ó (a/c)) / X, for B calculated similarly.
note.content3: 3. Feed: limiting reactant mole ratio is 1, excess is the entered feed ratio (r).
note.content4: 4. As reaction progresses (X variable), partial pressures are calculated considering stoichiometric consumption.
note.content5: 5. Arrhenius equation: k = k‚ÇÄ¬∑exp(‚ÄìE/(R¬∑T)), k is converted to hourly.
note.content7: 7. Catalyst amount: W = ‚à´‚ÇÄ^(X) [F‚ÇÄ_lim / r(X)] dX, numerically by trapezoidal integration.

cv.name: Kadir AYANA
cv.title: Chemical Engineer & Researcher | R&D | Process Development
cv.summary: Results-driven Chemical Engineer with expertise in R&D, process optimization, and quality control. Proven track record in formulation development, laboratory testing (ASTM), and team leadership. Strong technical skills: process engineering, reaction kinetics, thermodynamics, MATLAB, Python. Seeking opportunities in process development, product innovation, or research engineering.

totalEnergies.title: TotalEnergies
totalEnergies.desc1: Executed ASTM-compliant QC testing; ensured raw material & product specifications compliance.
totalEnergies.desc2: Managed laboratory equipment maintenance; calibrated analytical instruments.
totalEnergies.desc3: Documented test results; collaborated cross-functionally for continuous improvement.
totalEnergies.desc4: Enforced HSE protocols; maintained 100% safety compliance.

alpkim.title: Alpkim Adhesives
alpkim.desc1: Exceeded sales targets; delivered technical presentations & built strategic customer partnerships.
alpkim.desc2: Managed CRM pipeline & tracked performance metrics.

kanatRD.title: Kanat Paints and Coatings
kanatRD.desc1: Conducted laboratory testing; validated paint formulations vs. ISO/ASTM standards.
kanatRD.desc2: Co-authored TUBITAK 1505 grant project; developed innovative water-based coating solutions.
kanatRD.desc3: Led 15+ formulation projects; achieved 3 successful product launches with zero defects; mentored 4 junior researchers.
kanatRD.desc4: Temporarily managed R&D Waterborne Paints division (3 months); optimized workflows resulting in 25% faster project delivery; received recognition for excellence.

ims.title: IMS Polymers
ims.desc1: Analyzed production workflows; identified efficiency improvement opportunities.
ims.desc2: Supported inventory tracking and process documentation.

masters.title: Ege University
masters.courses: Solid Waste Recycling, Catalyst Deactivation, Statistical Methods in Experimental Design, Engineering Thermoplastics, Applied Engineering Mathematics, Minitab

bachelors.title: Ege University
bachelors.courses: Process Control, Chemical Engineering Design, Mass Transfer, Heat Transfer, Thermodynamics, Reaction Engineering, MATLAB, AutoCAD, PolyMATH, MS Office

certs.aromZero: AROM SIFIR ATIK VE UYGULAMALARI (Zero Waste and Processing)
certs.aiMl: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE BASED MACHINE LEARNING AND BASIC ALGORITHMS TRAINING

cv.projects1: Development of water-based acrylic resin with high surface tolerance (Kanat Paints and Coatings - TUBITAK 1505 Projects)
cv.projects2: Development of water-based paint that can be applied with scratch-resistant rollers that can adhere to PMMA surfaces (Kanat Paints and Coatings)
cv.projects3: Development of heat resistant electrical insulation varnish (Kanat Paints and Coatings)
cv.projects4: Development of water-based paint providing thermal insulation for military vehicles (Kanat Paints and Coatings)
cv.projects5: Development of high chemical resistance water-based paint that can adhere to aircraft cabin plastic parts (Kanat Paints and Coatings)
cv.projects6: ANILINE PRODUCTION FROM NITROBENZENE (Ege University - Chemical Engineering Design Project)
cv.projects7: ALLYL CHLORIDE PRODUCTION BY PROPYLENE CHLORINATION (Ege University - Chemical Engineering Design Project)
cv.projects8: SYNTHESIS OF EPOXIDIZED SOYBEAN OIL FOR UV CURABLE COATING (Graduation project completed in collaboration with Akzo Nobel - Ege University)
